title: Non-compliant equipment
fullText: Where in-service inspection or testing identifies equipment that fails to comply with the criteria given in this standard, the equipment shall be appropriately distinguishably labelled to indicate that the equipment requires remedial action and warn against further use. Such equipment shall be withdrawn from service. The choice of remedial action, disposal or other corrective action shall be determined by the owner or the person responsible for the safety of the site where the equipment is used.
